Articles.Content:
Just curious, the main engines are balanced OK but when RCS is triggered, it just seems 2x as loud as it needs to be.

I can't seem to find separate controls.

23 hours ago, Ratwerke_Actual said:

I can't seem to find separate controls.

Me neither but if you are playing on PC/Mac, it's probably doable by tweaking the config files for the RCS thrusters, since they contain an "AUDIO" node which provides some audio volume settings. From the linear RCS thruster: 

AUDIO
{
	channel = Ship
	clip = sound_rocket_mini
	volume = 0.0 0.0
	volume = 0.02 0.2
	volume = 0.5 0.2
	volume = 1.0 0.2
	pitch = 0.0 0.75
	pitch = 1.0 1.5
	loop = true
}

Maybe, playing around with these numbers will actually lower the volume but I've never tried it
I would actually suggest to run a ModuleManager patch instead of editing the configs directly, but it's up to you.
